name: Desktop Defender (gastricsparrow)
description:
Desktop Defender is a familiar looking but fresh typing game where you defend your PC desktop against waves of viruses!

Made by Duc Vu (GastricSparrow) for Round 1 of the 2023 GDKO jam.

Engine: Godot 3

Credits:

  • Graphics: My own and totally original (no but really, I drew or re-drew everything - maybe I shouldn't have)
  • Sounds
    • "Chewing, Carrot, A.wav" by InspectorJ (www.jshaw.co.uk). Freesound.org
    • "alertError.wav" by neopolitansixth. Freesound.org
    • "cursor.mp3" by Loyalty_Freak_Music. Freesound.org

and a few other CC0 sounds.

I may or may not have run out of time towards the end and only implemented 20% of the upgrades I wanted. Oh well.
